channel.title: oss-security mailing list
channel.description:
https://oss-security.openwall.org/wiki/mailing-lists/oss-security
> The purpose of the Open Source Security (oss-security) group is to encourage public discussion of security flaws, concepts, and practices in the Open Source community. The members of this group include, but are not limited to Open Source projects, distributors, researchers, and developers.

item.title: oss-security mailing list
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The idea is outreach, to present for example

  • https://github.com/Whonix/hardened-kernel
  • https://github.com/Whonix/security-misc
  • https://github.com/Whonix/apparmor-profile-everything

and to get more eyes on it.

Read full topic

The purpose of the Open Source Security (oss-security) group is to encourage public discussion of security flaws, concepts, and practices in the Open Source community. The members of this group include, but are not limited to Open Source projects, distributors, researchers, and developers.
